job.description:
{"@context": "http://schema.org", "@type": "JobPosting", "datePosted": "2021-10-05T17:40:59.000Z", "description": "

Senior Software Engineer - Core Payments \u2013 Leading FinTech \u2013 Tempe, Arizona


Are you an Experienced Software Engineer that wants to make a meaningful impact in an organization?


Are you interested in working in a banking organization that works more like a tech innovation org compared to a traditional bank?


Are you looking to work in an Agile environment with a clear career progression?

 

My Client, a leading Fintech Organization based in the San Francisco Bay Area, are looking to grow their Core Payments tech teams with both Lead and Senior full-stack software engineers with both Java and JavaScript (ReactJS) in Phoenix, Arizona.


The ideal person should have the necessary skills and experience to provide technical guidance, estimation of efforts, understanding; and decide upon the optimal technology solution to achieve the desired business needs.


You will ideally have:


  • 5+ years of development experience as a Software Engineer
  • Hands-on development experience in Java, J2EE, Spring Boot, etc.
  • A deep fascination of building elegant, maintainable, well-documented, secure code \u2013 Abstracting and refactoring should be a passion, not a chore
  • Experience with TDD and CI/CD
  • Experience with JavaScript, React.JS, HTML, CSS, etc
  • Experience with distributed systems and with Micro-services architecture.
  • Experience working within a cloud environment, including Amazon Web Services (AWS)


This is an excellent opportunity to work with a leading and highly respected Financial Organization, which are going through a vast and fascinating digital transformation.


They have multiple office locations across the USA and can work on a Hybrid Model, although all interviews are currently fully remote.


Excellent salary, bonus and benefits on offer!


Send in your details ASAP to find out more and receive a full job specification
